description: This app may just change the entire internet! It's super fast, clean and runs on Chrome so Chrome extensions just work. You can even get paid to view privacy respecting ads, because your time has value. Highly recommend!
summary: Brave the new internet! SUPER FAST and rewarding!

description: All the advantages of a chrome browser, with possible addons and usability but in addition even faster, more private and the really great idea about the BAT Tokens.
summary: The best browser with a hopefully bright future!

description: A great browser for those who like privacy, but it is still sketchy on Linux. That's to be expected in the beta so I have high hopes!
